item.title: Jack White Fires Back After Trump’s ‘Pathetic’ White House Calls Him a ‘Washed-Up, Has-Been Loser’: Trump Is a ‘Danger to the Entire World’

item.title: Jack White Goes Scorched Earth on Donald Trump: “How Petty and Pathetic and Thin Skinned Could This Administration Get?”
item.description: White issued a lengthy statement after a Trump Administration official called him a “washed-up, has-been loser” this week after White critiqued Trump’s design choices at the Oval Office.
